message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that's really valuable to me. I'm asking for $120 for it. Let me know if you're interested!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $90 for it. Let me know what you think!
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $90 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $105. It's a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're still interested.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $105 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable spending. I'm willing to go up to $95.  Let's see if we can close this deal!
